name: O.O.C. 2077
description:
Panic! we are late! submission of a very raw state... aaaargh!

Welcome in the world of CyberPunk and our game O.C.C. 2077  .. you are ..... well, you don't remember actually. It hurts, that's what you know... upon inspection of yourself after you regain consciousness, there is a hole in your forehead. A HOLE? WTF?

Well ... seems lik you earned a Headshot ... you were SO PRETTY! well, now you are.. OUT OF CONTROL!

PS: GameJam style ;)

Ffirst topdown shooter we attempted. first AI we attempted. 48h were not enough, honestly. We would love to improve a LOT and we actually might.
